fast3d.util.serial

Class VecBinaryWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.util.serial.BinaryWriter
      • fast3d.util.serial.VecBinaryWriter

  • public class VecBinaryWriter
extends BinaryWriter
    providing the possibility to write vectors
    can be treated as a BinaryWriter
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VecBinaryWriter(java.io.OutputStream stream)
      just calling super-constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean write(Material... mats)
      serializes and writes all given materials to the stream
      boolean write(Vector2d... vecs)
      serializes and writes all given vectors to the stream
      in fact this does just write the coordinates of the given vectors as doubles

      serializes and writes all given vectors to the stream
      in fact this does just write the coordinates of the given vectors as doubles

      serializes and writes all given vectors to the stream
      in fact this does just write the coordinates of the given vectors as doubles

      • write

        public boolean write(Vector4d... vecs)
        serializes and writes all given vectors to the stream
        in fact this does just write the coordinates of the given vectors as doubles
        Parameters:
        vecs - all vectors to serialize (will not be changed)
        Returns:
        whether all vectors have been serialized and written successfully
